name: Midnight
description: In this golf-like game your task is to guide a little square shaped fairy, Midnight. Use your mouse to launch Midnight, but watch out this world is full of danger.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or newer Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM

reviews.review_text: Highly recommend this game! Beautiful, clean graphics, relaxing piano music, and 56 entertaining puzzles - yup, this is one of the best games to just chill out and test your problem solving skills. I'll be honest I'm not usually a puzzle gamer, but the creators made an irresistable atmosphere to play in. It made me feel like sneaking out at night as a child and playing in a field or jungle gym. Despite my occasional outbursts of 'Gaaaaaaaaaaahh!', I'm looking forward to beating all the levels and getting a perfect 3/3!
Music 5/10 Graphic 4/10 Story 8/10 Colours In-game 2/10 (pretty borring)   Me: I'm not a big fan of this game... and too high price for the game! Ty for listening =)
